nodes.text: Lachichuk was a male Wookiee Warrior who fought alongside the Galactic Republic against the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the latter's attempt to invade the Wookiee species' homeworld of Kashyyyk in the year 19 BBY. He had brown hair.

Lachichuk first appeared in the film Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith, which was released on May 19, 2005. The Wookiee had been previously named in the in the Star Wars Legends reference book Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith: The Visual Dictionary, which was written by James Luceno and released on April 2, 2005. The name was confirmed to be canon in the video game Star Wars: Force Collection, which was initially released in 2013.
